packages/translator-default/test/fixtures/error-at-tags-body-only-if/template.marko(2,6): @tags do not support the "body-only-if" attribute.
  1 | <some-tag>
> 2 |     <@header class="my-header" body-only-if(true)>
    |      ^^^^^^^
  3 |         Header content
  4 |     </@header>
  5 | </some-tag>
